DigitalZen: Screen Time, On Your Terms

Unlock the full potential of your DigitalZen experience with our official extension! Whether you’re a dedicated user of the DigitalZen app or just looking to optimize your digital life, this extension is your key to a more focused and balanced online presence.

Enhance your ability to manage distractions by integrating directly with your browser. This extension amplifies DigitalZen’s core features, enabling you to enforce your focus and well-being strategies directly within your web environment. From scheduling screen time to blocking disruptive websites and enabling Monk Mode, the extension serves as your personal gatekeeper to a world of increased productivity and reduced digital stress.

Features Include:


Enhanced Blocking: Block websites based on various rules or set daily usage limits to maintain a distraction-free digital space.


Custom Focus Times: Set focus times, select websites or apps to focus on, and block anything not on your whitelist for uninterrupted productivity.


Easy Installation: Enjoy a hassle-free setup with predefined templates that get you started in no time.


Gamified Experience: Make productivity fun with our gamified approach, turning focus into a rewarding challenge.

Seamless Integration: Works with https://my.digitalzen.app productivity website and can also function with the DigitalZen app for a unified experience across your devices.


Get more from DigitalZen with this essential extension, and transform your interaction with digital spaces. Embrace the art of productive living and make each moment online count towards your well-being and focus.

Install now and experience the true power of DigitalZen, right at your fingertips!


Please Note: This extension seamlessly integrates with https://my.digitalzen.app productivity website and can operate independently or alongside the DigitalZen app
